abstract: In suing federal agencies, three environmental groups argue that TransCanada has already started to prepare the route for the 1,700-mile Ketsyone XL pipeline even through environmental reviews are not complete.
snippet: In suing federal agencies, three environmental groups argue that TransCanada has already started to prepare the route for the 1,700-mile Ketsyone XL pipeline even through environmental reviews are not complete.

headline.main: On Our Radar: A Pipeline Lawsuit
